item.title: Protective lung ventilation
item.description: General Protective lung ventilation aims for low tidal volume ventilation. A large study has shown a decrease in mortality, when patients with acute lung injury/ARDS were ventilated with low tidal volumes. Today, the protective lung ventilation algorithm by the ARDS network provides a reasonable default approach for mechanically ventilated patients, especially those at risk for developing ARDS Ventilation setup and adjustment Calculate the predicted body weight (men: 50 + 0.91 (length in cm - 152), women: 45 + 0.
